power.title: Avenger's Resolve
power.fluff: For a few moments, your faith infuses you with supernatural toughness

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy other than your oath target hits you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain resist 5 all until the start of the acting creature's next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Resist 10 all.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Resist 15 all.

power.title: Blessing of Vengeance
power.fluff: With the death of your foe, your god grants you a boon

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your oath target is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain a number of hit points equal to your level + your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Distracting Flare
power.fluff: Divine light surrounds you, providing a distraction while you slip away unseen

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You become invisible, and move your speed. The invisibility lasts until the end of this movement.
If you spend another action to continue the movement, the invisibility lasts until the end of that movement instead.

power.title: Enduring Spirit
power.fluff: The strength of your spirit shines most brightly in adversity

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be bloodied.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Holy Blessing
power.fluff: Kissing your holy symbol, you immediately consider your next prey and how best to attack

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the oath of enmity class power.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your oath target is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy other than your oath target

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use your oath of enmity class power on the target as part of this action, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Loyal Sanction
power.fluff: You bless your comrade's efforts to aid you in the defeat of your chosen foe

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally you can see

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a power bonus to damage rolls against your oath target equal to your Dexterity modifier or your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Refocus Enmity
power.fluff: After searching your soul, you realize who your true foe is and swear an oath against it

section.text: Using this power does not trigger opportunity attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One create you can see

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target becomes your oath target, replacing your current oath target.

power.title: Resonant Escape
power.fluff: A quick prayer as you dodge calls forth divine power, which carries you a short distance away

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Righteous Pursuit
power.fluff: Try as your enemy might, there's no escaping your wrath

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your oath target ends its turn in a space not adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier and must end this movement as close to your oath target as possible.

power.title: Silver Shadow
power.fluff: You cloak yourself in astral mist, which guards you from harm

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain temporary hit points equal 2 + to your level + your Wisdom modifier.
While you have these temporary hit points, you also have concealment.
